column5: Dave does it again  . I was at the Dofasco Fishing Club meeting last night and Dave Mercer was there speaker. I think this was my 6th. Dave Mercer seminar I've seen and still come out with sore cheeks from laughing  . All the guys setting at our table had a great time. Thanks again Dave for a great entertaining night.
Dave always does a great job! and its never the same show.  but why does he eat all the plastics?
Thanks I had a blast last night it was a great crowd! Sorry I did not get to hang out while there.
